name: SAMOT
description: An NFT Club that introduces the amazing Latin American artistic style. From diverse artists, the first collection comes from the creator himself. Welcome to Samot´s World and enjoy the ride.

name: PYRAMYD
description: PYRAMYD is a young, prolific artist from the City of Buenos Aires. His work, materialized by mixing various techniques and resources, has focused on the creation of unique universes where physical, digital and ethereal blend as one.
html:
PYRAMYD is a young, prolific artist from the City of Buenos Aires. His work, materialized by mixing various techniques and resources, has focused on the creation of unique universes where physical, digital and ethereal blend as one.

During the month of September, he forced himself to live in his studio for 30 days. Determined to create one painting a day, PYRAMYD emerged from that extreme experience with a breathtaking series of unique pieces that make up the backbone for his NFT collection. This is PYRAMYD x Samot Club.
whoisDescription: Graffiti, muralism, sculpture and design come together in this 27 year old Argentinian artist’s work. An innate rule breaker, he has taken his artistic expression to many cities and countries around the globe. A combination of calligraphy, symbology, geometry, strong color pallets and impacting visuals turn his pieces into an intoxicating experience, colliding the boundaries of language and artistic perception.
publicSale: Public Sale: 11/14/21 @ 7PM UTC | Price .1 ETH | Limit 5 per transaction

name: SAM ELGRECO
description: Sam Elgreco was born in Sao Paulo, Brazil, in 1986. After a few years he moves to Buenos Aires to study fine arts and design, and that’s where the idea of painting in public spaces becomes a constant.

name: DYLAN LERNER
description: Throw the name around a couple of places: Cannes Film Festival, Berlin's underground scene, or even among vintage Rolling Stones managers. Big chances are someone has worked with him.

name: TOMI POMO
description: Tomi Pomo is an Argentine art director, visual artist, tattooist and designer. He has built a reputation as one of the most prestigious tattoo artists in Buenos Aires, leaving traces of his masterful lines in several top tier studios in the capital, such as the niche Local Support.
